body:
## Welcome

This page offers resources for those interested in deploying [Perl](http://www.perl.org/) and Perl applications using the [Chef](http://wiki.opscode.com/display/chef/Home) configuration management tool

## Cookbooks

The Perl Chef repository currently contains two cookbooks.

* [Perlbrew](https://github.com/dagolden/perl-chef/tree/master/cookbooks/perlbrew) -- install and configure isolated, custom perls with the [Perlbrew application](http://p3rl.org/App::perlbrew)
* [Carton](https://github.com/dagolden/perl-chef/tree/master/cookbooks/carton) -- deploy perl apps packaged with the [Carton application](http://p3rl.org/Carton)

If you've developed other cookbooks, please let us know and we'll link to them.

## Resources

Some presentations, tutorials and screencasts are forthcoming.  Stay tuned.

## Community

While it's broader than Chef, the perl-devops@perl.org mailing list is a new forum for discussing Perl development and deployment issues.  Subscribe by emailing perl-devops-subscribe@perl.org.

## Feedback

Have ideas, code or documentation for Perl Chef?  Found bugs?  Please [file a ticket](https://github.com/dagolden/perl-chef/issues/new) and let us know.
